Contact: Looking for an organizer? Contact with one of them through Slack. They have a HackUPC watermark like mine in their profile photos. If you want to contact with them personally, look for a person with a dark gray #595959 T-Shirt
Problem: Are you okay? If you are in trouble, please ping directly @maria and @dreaqdp and find an organizer. There are 25 around the venue. All of them wear dark gray #595959 T-shirts.
